ignorepls: This json file stores all the data about my projects.
I'm trying to include as much data as possible
featured is the projects that will be featured on the main homepage, the rest will be viewable on a separate projects page that i will be making in the future
blogpost will be a url for a blog that i will be making in the future
photos will be an array of urls to images of the project
type is the type of the project, for example software-website software-commandline software-misc hardware-microcontroller hardware-misc
projectlanguage is the (human) language that is used for the project, for example English or Indonesian
language is the languange used to make the project, for example Javascript, HTML, PHP, CSS, Python etc
the key for each project is unique and will be used as the slug in the future (so no spaces or weird symbols)
also, everything will be written in human readable text (for example the date is just regular date format, and not using unix time or something like that)
im doing this because apparently JSON doesnt have any comments support, kinda makes sense why it doesnt have it. but kinda annoying that is doesnt have it

desc.en: This website you are currently viewing is the latest version of my website. Made with very simple and minimalistic design and utilizing many modern frameworks like NextJS, ReactJS, and TailwindCSS. This website is deployed to Github Pages using Github Actions to allow dynamic content while keeping the cost at virtually zero
desc.id: Website yang sedang anda lihat ini adalah versi terbaru dari website saya. Dibuat dengan desain yang sederhana dan minimalis dan juga menggunakan berbagai framework modern seperti NextJS, ReactJS, dan TailwindCSS. Website ini di-deploy pada Github Pages menggunakan Github Actions untuk membuat konten dinamis dengan biaya yang hampir nol

desc.en: The project that every web developer makes. A simple todo list app that stores the list in the browser localStorage. Styled with TailwindCSS
desc.id: Proyek yang dibuat setiap web developer. Aplikasi todo list sederhana yang menyimpan daftar pada localStorage browser. Styling menggunakan TailwindCSS
